Contributor: Insurance Press, Inc., printer.; Federation of Women's Foreign Mission Boards of North America, publisher.;
Note: Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text is a message from Edith Cavell which says that "Patriotism is not enough." There is an emergency call for recruits: doctors and nurses are needed to help other women all over the world. Illustration is a statue of Edith Cavell.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: New York : Federation of Woman's Boards of Foreign Missions,
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: Women in war -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; World War, 1914-1918 -- War work -- United States.; War posters, American.;

Title: Patriotism is not enough
